display.title: Blaze Powder
description: If you've killed a Blaze before, you may have noticed it dropped &&eSulfur Dust&&r instead of a &&cBlaze Rod&&r.
In order to get &&6Blaze Powder&&r, you must instead combine &&7Carbon Dust&&r and &&eSulfur Dust&&r in a &&3HV Chemical Reactor&&r.

subtitle.text: Took a while to get some of this, right?
